name: Lustered Armorial Plate
maker: Workshop of Giorgio di Pietro Andreoli, known as Maestro Giorgio
description: Lustered Armorial Plate; Workshop of Giorgio di Pietro Andreoli, known as Maestro Giorgio (Italian, about 1465 - about 1555); Gubbio, Umbria, Italy; 1524; Tin-glazed earthenware with silver luster; 7.3 x 39.8 cm (2 7/8 x 15 11/16 in.); 84.DE.111; J.
